1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: A beautiful, eccentric woman embarks on a search for Sa Keum Ran, a fat housewife who rejected a chance at full-body plastic surgery to make her "beautiful."

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Kang Joo and Chae Yeon announces their upcoming wedding. Keum Ran becomes "Sara" to seduce Kang Joo and break the relationship apart. (DramaFever)

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Keum Ram tries to have a one-night stand with Kang Joo. Chae Yeon confronts her about her affair, and warns to back away. (DramaFever)

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Keum Ran suspects a conspiracy behind her death, and enters the Lee household to investigate. (DramaFever)

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Kang Joo and Chae Yeon have their wedding early. Keum Ran and Tae Hee conspire to enter the couple's lives and ruin them. (DramaFever)

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Tae Hee is confused by his new-found feelings for Keum Ran, while Keum Ran reconciles with her ex-husband and destroys his family. (DramaFever)

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Keum Ran destroys her ex-husband's family home. Videos of her eating go viral on the internet. (DramaFever)

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Tae Hee and Keum Ran work together to get Kang Joo to confess to the murder. Han Min Hyuk becomes obsessed with finding "Sara". (DramaFever)

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Keum Ran becomes a star on Chae Yeon's HBS show. Tae Hee tries to save his grandmother from prison. (DramaFever)

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Tae Hee challenges Han Min Hyuk's claim to Winner Group's CEO position, and celebrates Keum Ran's birthday. (DramaFever)

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Tae Hee and Keum Ran spend their first day together as a couple. Lee Kang Joon finds out who and Sara's secret man is. (DramaFever)

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Keum Ran enters the Birth of a Chef cooking competition. Gyo Chae Yeon makes up with Lee Kang Joon, and retaliates. (DramaFever)

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Kang Joon takes Keum Ran to a hotel after her allergy attack, and Kang Joon's family hears that their former daughter-in-law may be alive. (DramaFever)

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Keum Ran figures out how to respond to Tae Hee's marriage proposals. Meanwhile, Kang Joon pieces together who Sara really is.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Tae Hee and Sara plan their wedding. Lee Kang Joon and Gyo Chae Yeon will stop at nothing to make sure they don't marry. (DramaFever)

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Sara stays by Tae Hee's side throughout his recovery, while the people around them urges her to break up with him. (DramaFever)

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Sara returns to her mother's hometown instead of going abroad. The men in her life set out to find her one by one. (DramaFever)

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: Sara inadvertently joins forces with Han Min Hyuk against Tae Hee. Lee Kang Joon finds himself hitting rock bottom as he loses his family's support. (DramaFever)

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Han Min Hyuk forces Sara to cut off all contact with Tae Hee. Pushed into a corner, Sara had no choice but to use her last resort. (DramaFever)

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Tae Hee and Sara get back together to bring down their enemies. Sara books a talk show to be interviewed by Gyo Chae Yeon. (DramaFever)

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: To marry Sa Keum Ran, Tae Hee needs Lee Kang Joon to sign divorce papers. Han Min Hyuk plots to kill Tae Hee. (DramaFever)

imdb.plot outline: Overweight, kind-hearted Sa Geum-ran (Ha Jae-sook) married into a well-to-do family, but her husband Lee Kang-joon (Jung Gyu-woon) has spent the past seven years in the United States for his business, and she lives with his mother and sisters who treat her badly. Geum-ran learns that Kang-joon has been having an affair with sophisticated broadcast announcer Gyo Chae-yeon (Wang Ji-hye), and he asks for a divorce. When she sees her in-laws welcoming Chae-yeon with open arms, the distraught Geum-ran threatens her husband, who follows her and causes her to drive her car off a cliff. Everyone assumes that Geum-ran committed suicide and attends her funeral, not knowing that she's still alive. To get revenge against those who've wronged and betrayed her, Geum-ran begs Han Tae-hee (Joo Sang-wook), whom she thought was the plastic surgeon of extreme-makeover television show Change, to transform her, and he reluctantly agrees because of his own ulterior motives. After weight loss and surgery, Geum-ran emerges from the full-body makeover as a stunningly beautiful woman, and she begins calling herself the new name Sara (Han Ye-seul), albeit retaining her coarse ajumma personality. With Tae-hee as her life coach, they scheme to ruin Kang-joon and Chae-yeon's upcoming wedding in three weeks. But as Sara interacts with Kang-joon in their staged run-ins, old feelings resurface, and she decides that instead of destroying him, she wants her husband back. They adjust their plan accordingly, though Tae-hee soon finds himself falling for Sara.
imdb.title: Birth of a Beauty

Everyone assumes that Geum-ran committed suicide and attends her funeral, not knowing that she's still alive. To get revenge against those who've wronged and betrayed her, Geum-ran begs Han Tae-hee (Joo Sang-wook), whom she thought was the plastic surgeon of extreme-makeover television show Change, to transform her, and he reluctantly agrees because of his own ulterior motives. After weight loss and surgery, Geum-ran emerges from the full-body makeover as a stunningly beautiful woman, and she begins calling herself the new name Sara (Han Ye-seul), albeit retaining her coarse ajumma personality. With Tae-hee as her life coach, they scheme to ruin Kang-joon and Chae-yeon's upcoming wedding in three weeks.
